Dress in soft jersey with a skirt in a double layer of tulle, the top layer with dangling, shimmering sequins (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Glittery print motif on the front. Lined skirt.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, ribbed V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Windbreaker in woven fabric with piping in a contrasting colour. Stand-up collar, detachable hood with a concealed hook and loop fastening and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Fully lined swimsuit with cut-out details at the sides and a partially open back. Shoulder straps that join to form a racer back, and medium coverage at the back.

Set with two hats, two scarves and a pair of bootees in soft cotton jersey. Hats with sewn-on ears at the top and an embroidery detail on the turned-up hem. Double-layered scarves with a press-stud at one side. Bootees with foldover ribbing at the top and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
